headline: Sentiment down 42% this week, fears declining
key_insights: Frustrations trending up 89% over 7 days (strong momentum)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations dominate with 135 quotes and an overwhelming 111 at strong intensity - people are extremely angry and venting hard today.

• This frustration level of 110.7 nearly matches the 42-day peak, making it one of the most intense periods recently.

• Optimism recovered significantly from yesterday's deep low but remains in negative territory with mixed intensity levels.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
